sourcesContent:
import { View, ImageBackground, Text, StyleSheet } from 'react-native';
import { LinearGradient } from 'expo-linear-gradient';
import { AntDesign } from "@expo/vector-icons"
export default function HomeScreen() {
    return (
        <ImageBackground source={require('../assets/images/developer.jpg')} style={{ flex: 1, width: "100%", height: "100%" }}>
            <LinearGradient colors={["transparent", "blue"]} style={{ height: "100%" }} >
                <View style={{ flex: 1 }}>
                    <Text style={sheet.skip}>Skip</Text>
                    <View style={sheet.textBallCont}>
                        <Text style={sheet.description}>Search for Service providers around you</Text>
                        <View style={sheet.ball}></View>
                    </View>
                    <View style={sheet.circle}>
                        <View style={sheet.line}></View>
                        <AntDesign name='caretright' style={{ fontSize: 20, marginTop: "-2px" }} />
                    </View>
                </View>
            </LinearGradient>
        </ImageBackground>
    );
}

const sheet = StyleSheet.create({
    skip: {
        fontSize: 20,
        fontWeight: "700",
        alignSelf: "flex-start",
        marginLeft: "auto",
        marginRight: "10px",
        marginTop: "10px",
        color: "#fff"
    },
    textBallCont:{
      marginTop:"auto",
      marginBottom:"10vh",
      padding:`10px`   
    },
    description: {
        fontSize: 25,
        fontWeight: "700",
        alignSelf: "flex-end",
        margin: "auto",
        marginBottom: "3vh",
        color: "#fff"
    },
    ball: {
        width: "20px",
        height: "20px",
        borderRadius: 50,
        backgroundColor: "#F8B720"
    },
    circle: {
        flexDirection: "row",
        alignItems: "center",
        justifyContent: "center",
        width: "50px",
        height: "50px",
        borderRadius: 50,
        backgroundColor: "#fff",
        marginLeft: "auto",
        marginRight: "15px",
        marginBottom: "15px",

    },
    line: {
        marginRight: "-5px",
        width: "15px",
        height: "6px",
        borderBottomLeftRadius: 50,
        borderTopLeftRadius: 50,
        backgroundColor: "blue",
    }
})
